name: AVAudioPlayerNodeBufferOptions
desc: The buffer options that control the playback scheduling.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

items.name: static var loops: AVAudioPlayerNodeBufferOptions
items.desc: An option that indicates the buffer loops indefinitely.

items.name: static var interrupts: AVAudioPlayerNodeBufferOptions
items.desc: An option that indicates the buffer interrupts any buffer in a playing state.

items.name: static var interruptsAtLoop: AVAudioPlayerNodeBufferOptions
items.desc: An option that indicates the buffer interrupts any buffer in a playing state at its loop point.
